testcase.name: Register an user in the PetStore Page
testcase.system-out: Given the user is already in the petstore homepage..........................passed Then the user is in the registration menu...................................passed Then the user enters the required details for account creation..............passed Then the user enters his username and password for signin...................passed And click on the sign in button.............................................passed Then the user selects fish for ordering.....................................passed Then the user adds the selected fish to the cart............................passed Then the user checkout the fish by entering the payment details.............passed Then the user successfully places the order.................................passed
